code: import*as actionTypes from"./actionTypes";export var returnErrors=function returnErrors(msg,status){var id=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:null;return{type:actionTypes.GET_ERROR,payload:{msg:msg,status:status,id:id}};};export var clearErrors=function clearErrors(){return{type:actionTypes.CLEAR_ERROR};};
